mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_JKR_M_JGI_MST(JGI_NO, JGI_NAME, JGI_NAME_KANA, SEX_CD, SEX_NAME, KOYOU_KB, KOYOU_NAME, NYUUSYA_DAY, BIRTH_DAY, TAISHOKU_KB, TAISHOKU_CD, TAISHOKU_NAME, TAISHOKU_DAY, HATUREI_DAY, KENMU_KB, SHOZOKU_SEI_NAME, SHOZOKU_RYAKU_NAME, SOS_NAME, BUMON_SEI_NAME1, BUMON_SEI_NAME2, BUMON_SEI_NAME3, BUMON_SEI_NAME4, BUMON_SEI_NAME5, BUMON_SEI_NAME6, BUMON_RYAKU_NAME1, BUMON_RYAKU_NAME2, BUMON_RYAKU_NAME3, BUMON_RYAKU_NAME4, BUMON_RYAKU_NAME5, BUMON_RYAKU_NAME6, SOS_CD1, SOS_CD2, SOS_CD3, SOS_CD4, SOS_CD5, SOS_CD6, LINE_STAFF_KB, SHOKUSEI_CD, SHOKUSEI_NAME, SHUKKOU_CD, SHUKKOU_NAME, SHUKKOU_TAN_NAME, KINMU_BA_JOU_NAME, ROUSO_KB, KINMU_KB, SHOKUSHU_CD, SHOKUSHU_NAME, JIGYO_JO_CD, JIGYO_JO_SEI_NAME, JIGYO_JO_RYAKU_NAME, KAIGAI_KINMU_CD, KAIGAI_KINMU_NAME, COMPANY_CD, COMPANY_NAME, KINMU_TDFKN_CD, KINMU_TDFKN_NAME, KINMU_SCSN_CD, KINMU_SCSN_NAME, SOS_CD, SOS_TAIKEI_CD, SEWA_SOS_TAIKEI_CD, SEWA_SOS_TAIKEI_HOSOKU, SEWA_SOS_CD, OLD_JGI_NO, OLD_KOYOU_KB, OLD_KOYOU_NAME, SHOKUI_CD, SHOKUI_NAME, BUMON_RANK, SEWA_BUMON_RANK, KIHON_UP_DATE, SYOZOKU_UP_DATE, JGI_KB) VALUES (#{jgiNo}, #{jgiName}, #{jgiNameKana}, #{sexCd}, #{sexName}, #{koyouKb}, #{koyouName}, #{nyuusyaDay}, #{birthDay}, #{taishokuKb}, #{taishokuCd}, #{taishokuName}, #{taishokuDay}, #{hatureiDay}, #{kenmuKb}, #{shozokuSeiName}, #{shozokuRyakuName}, #{sosName}, #{bumonSeiName1}, #{bumonSeiName2}, #{bumonSeiName3}, #{bumonSeiName4}, #{bumonSeiName5}, #{bumonSeiName6}, #{bumonRyakuName1}, #{bumonRyakuName2}, #{bumonRyakuName3}, #{bumonRyakuName4}, #{bumonRyakuName5}, #{bumonRyakuName6}, #{sosCd1}, #{sosCd2}, #{sosCd3}, #{sosCd4}, #{sosCd5}, #{sosCd6}, #{lineStaffKb}, #{shokuseiCd}, #{shokuseiName}, #{shukkouCd}, #{shukkouName}, #{shukkouTanName}, #{kinmuBaJouName}, #{rousoKb}, #{kinmuKb}, #{shokushuCd}, #{shokushuName}, #{jigyoJoCd}, #{jigyoJoSeiName}, #{jigyoJoRyakuName}, #{kaigaiKinmuCd}, #{kaigaiKinmuName}, #{companyCd}, #{companyName}, #{kinmuTdfknCd}, #{kinmuTdfknName}, #{kinmuScsnCd}, #{kinmuScsnName}, #{sosCd}, #{sosTaikeiCd}, #{sewaSosTaikeiCd}, #{sewaSosTaikeiHosoku}, #{sewaSosCd}, #{oldJgiNo}, #{oldKoyouKb}, #{oldKoyouName}, #{shokuiCd}, #{shokuiName}, #{bumonRank}, #{sewaBumonRank}, #{kihonUpDate}, #{syozokuUpDate}, #{jgiKb})
mapper.update: UPDATE S_JKR_M_JGI_MST SET JGI_NAME = #{update.jgiName},JGI_NAME = NULL,JGI_NAME_KANA = #{update.jgiNameKana},JGI_NAME_KANA = NULL,SEX_CD = #{update.sexCd},SEX_CD = NULL,SEX_NAME = #{update.sexName},SEX_NAME = NULL,KOYOU_KB = #{update.koyouKb},KOYOU_KB = NULL,KOYOU_NAME = #{update.koyouName},KOYOU_NAME = NULL,NYUUSYA_DAY = #{update.nyuusyaDay},NYUUSYA_DAY = NULL,BIRTH_DAY = #{update.jgiKb},JGI_KB = NULL, WHERE JGI_NO = #{search.jgiNo} AND KENMU_KB = #{search.kenmuKb}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM S_JKR_M_JGI_MST WHERE JGI_NO = #{jgiNo} AND KENMU_KB = #{kenmuKb}
mapper.select: SELECT DATA_KBN, -- DATA_CD, -- DATA_NAME, -- DATA_VALUE, -- DATA_SEQ, -- DEF_FLG, -- BIKO -- FROM IEI_MASTER.JKR_CD_MST -- WHERE DATA_KBN = #{inDataKbn} AND DATA_CD = #{inDataCd} ORDER BY DATA_SEQ
